name: Curious Island
description:
You're stuck on an island an Fabino the penguin won't let you get out! Find the treasure by completing puzzles in order to escape!

This game was made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam #50. The theme was "Islands" and the limitation was "Your game can only have 1 level".

Controls : 

- WASD to move

- Left mouse button to interact

by:

Lead Programming, art, sound: Vainer

Game design, Level design & build, art: Riro, Lolomonpoto

Lead artist & support: Superjes
